message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take 60% this time, since you rejected my fair offer. Let's see if you're willing to negotiate.
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'll offer a slight compromise, but don't expect me to give away too much.
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 525k,  you take 475k.  It's a fair compromise and we can end this game before inflation eats away at our gains.
